name: Western Energy Services Corp.
description: Western Energy Services Corp. is a leading provider of oilfield services based in Canada, specializing in the delivery of drilling and well completion solutions to the oil and gas industry. Established in 2010, the company has rapidly grown its footprint across North America, leveraging advanced technologies and experienced personnel to offer a range of services that include contract drilling, well servicing, and specialized equipment rentals. With a strong commitment to safety and environmental stewardship, Western Energy emphasizes the importance of sustainable practices within the energy sector. Its fleet of modern drilling rigs and service rigs is equipped to handle a variety of geological conditions, ensuring efficient and effective operations. The company also invests in research and development to enhance service offerings and improve operational efficiencies. Western Energy is dedicated to building long-term relationships with its clients through reliable service delivery and a deep understanding of their operational needs. As the energy landscape evolves, Western Energy remains focused on innovation and adapting to market changes, positioning itself as a trusted partner in the energy industry.

seo.meta_title: Western Energy Services Corp. | Oilfield Services and Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Western Energy Services Corp., a leader in oilfield services offering innovative drilling and well completion solutions in the North American energy sector.

faq.question: What services does Western Energy provide?
faq.answer: Western Energy provides contract drilling, well servicing, and specialized equipment rentals.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Western Energy?
faq.answer: M. David W. Lee is the CEO of Western Energy Services Corp.

faq.question: Where is Western Energy headquartered?
faq.answer: Western Energy is headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, Canada.
